text: "Blackberry Molasses" is 1996 song by American R&B; group Mista. It is the opening track from their debut studio album Mista. It went to number 53 in the United States and fared better in New Zealand where it peaked at number 4 on the chart. The music video was directed by Hype Williams. ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Debut singles Category:R&B; ballads
title: Blackberry Molasses
